svg.text: McCzarny recently made significant updates
across his repositories. In ghsummary, he
enhanced the Go application by adding support
for specifying user pronouns, allowing for
customized summary generation. He also
consistently updated the Gemini API model to
its latest preview versions, refining the
system prompt for concise, plain text,
SVG-suitable output. For git-simulator-ai-slop,
McCzarny implemented a "Reset" button in the
Git Explorer view to revert repository state.
He introduced draggable and collapsable
floating controls, improving the user
interface. A major focus was on deploying the
Next.js application to GitHub Pages, which
involved adding new GitHub Actions workflows
and configuring build and deployment steps. He
also updated deployment branch triggers and
added links to the live site in the README.
Additionally, he refined component behavior by
removing unintended draggable attributes from
commit nodes. These activities demonstrate a
focus on both application customization and
robust deployment practices.
Generated on: Sun Jun 22 02:06:22 2025
